name: Topcon RL-H5A Self Leveling Horizontal Rotary Laser with Bonus EDEN Field Book, IP66 Rating Drop, Dust, Water Resistant, 800m Construction Laser, Includes LS-80L Receiver, Detector Holder, Soft Case
short_description: MULTI-PURPOSE LASER: Grading, excavating and general construction projects are perfect applications for the RL-H5A. With the IP66 rating, the RL-H5A is "job site tough" and can withstand dust, a sudden shower and even torrential rainfall.

EASY TO USE: With electronic self-leveling, you press the power button and go right to work in seconds. If the RL-H5A gets disturbed on the job it relevels itself automatically. The self-leveling motors are accurate to ±10 arc seconds.
LONG RANGE WITH HIGH ACCURACY: Need to shoot elevations up to 800 m from your laser? No problem - this instrument has the power and range to cover a 800 m diameter job site.
KIT COMPONENTS: includes the RL-H5A laser and LS-80 Receiver, Sensor holder and Carry case.
product_description: The Topcon RL-H5A Self-Leveling Construction Laser has a long range operation of 800m (2,626 ft.) and a smart long range receiver. Simple, intuitive manual slope capability along with a tough IP66 construction rating. Plus/Minus 5-degree self-leveling range and up to 100 hours battery life.

name: Bosch Revolve2000 Self-Leveling System with Disturbance Monitor Horizontal-Vertical Rotary Laser Kit with 2000 Feet Working Range (Renewed)
short_description: Electronic Self-Leveling: The Revolve2000 features electronic self-leveling that allows for easy setup and use on the job
Vertical-Beam Functionality: This provides a vertical beam at 90-degree point for layout, squaring and plumb applications
Mounting Bracket: The laser receiver with mounting bracket allows for easy-to-read LCD dual display and easy attachment to leveling rod
Quick Clad Release: The lightweight aluminum tripod features a quick-clad release on legs and has a durable finish
Robust Design: It features a cage overmold and two large easy-to-grip carrying handles for convenience and additional drop protection

name: Takamine 16 Lines Green Laser Level Pro, 4x360° 4D Green Cross Line Professional for Construction, Two 360° Vertical and Two 360° Horizontal Laser Level Pulse Mode and Remote Controller
short_description: 4 X 360° green laser line: Takamine GM160 pro laser level has 2 horizontal 360° planes (the one on the ground can hit a 1/2" ultra-low horizontal line, and the one on the top can hit the lowest 4" horizontal line from the top surface), 2 vertical 360° plane with 16 laser lines can cover the floor, wall and ceiling around the room. The horizontal and vertical lines intersect at an angle of 90° to help you quickly visualize and complete the square layout

Ground/wall use and multiple installation methods: This line laser provides a 1/4" mounting thread for fixing on tripod or mounting pole. Equipped with 360° free rotating base, it can be rotated to desired angle. The base also has 1/4"-20 and 5/8"-11 mounting threads to adapt different tripod. It' equipped with a patented bracket that can be adjusted universally，which is currently the most adjustable in the market. It can be fixed to wall by magnetism or screws, so it can be used in more scenes

This self-leveling laser level adopts the SHARP green laser unit from Japan, which has excellent brightness and higher stability. Under the same lighting conditions, the green beam is twice as bright as the red laser, with a working range of up to 130 feet (100 LUX), and an accuracy of 33 feet ± 1/9 inch. Using the Takamine line laser receiver in strong light or outdoor conditions, the outdoor pulse mode helps to extend the laser range to 200 feet

Remote control and Type-c charging：With remote control, your calibration work becomes simple and quick. The newly upgraded Type-C charging speed is 60% faster than ordinary USB charging, and the external replaceable lithium battery makes it possible for you to work for a long time

Durable design and packaging content: IP54 waterproof/dustproof to ensure that you can work normally and stably under complex working conditions. The surroundings are protected by TPR soft rubber, which is shock-resistant, abrasion-resistant and impact-resistant. The package includes 1x laser level, 1x detachable lithium-ion battery, 1x patented multifunctional magnetic stand, 1x 360° free rotating base, 1x Type-c power cord, 1x power adapter, 1x professional portable storage box, user manual

name: Huepar 360° Laser Level with Tripod 60in, 82Ft - 165Ft Self Leveling Laser Level with Pulse Mode, 3 Brightness Levels Rechargeable Li-ion Battery Green Line Laser Leveler Tool for DIY Project
short_description: 3 Brightness Levels: You can adjust the brightness with 3 different levels, making it adaptable to different lighting conditions and ensuring maximum visibility in any indoor environment （Not suitable for outdoor use ）

360° Horizontal & 130° Vertical Line: Our laser level boasts a 360° horizontal line and a 130° vertical line, offering comprehensive coverage to meet all your leveling and alignment requirements. Whether it's walls, floors, or ceilings, it ensures precise measurements across a wide range of applications, making it an essential tool for your projects.

Type-C Charging Port and Durable Battery: Equipped with a built-in 2200mAh 3.7V Li-ion rechargeable battery, this 360 Laser Level provides up to 11 hours of continuous use. The Type-C charging port offers convenient charging options, including via phone, laptop, power bank, or car charger.

Self-Leveling, Manual & Pulse Mode: Boasting an accuracy of ±1/9 inch at 33 feet, this laser level guarantees accurate results every time, perfect for professional construction, home renovation, and DIY projects. In normal mode, it has a working range of up to 82 feet, while in pulse mode, it can reach up to 165 feet and performs well in outdoor daytime. Note that pulse mode requires the use of a Huepar laser receiver.

Enhanced Visibility with Green Laser Glasses & Accessories: The kit comes with a 60-inch tripod, an L-shaped magnetic wall mount, and green laser glasses. The advanced green laser technology provides superior visibility, enabling you to see the laser line more clearly and significantly boosting your work efficiency.

name: DEWALT Rotary Laser Level Kit, Indoor/Outdoor Survey Laser Transit (DW074KD)
short_description: Horizontal self-leveling automatically aligns the DEWALT laser level to center
The laser levels for construction are equipped with leveling vial for manual leveling in vertical mode
Protected rotary head and weatherproof design of the level laser deliver interior and exterior jobsite durability
Digital laser detector extends interior and exterior range to 600 ft.
Standby mode allows the user to pause the laser while transitioning from horizontal to vertical
product_description: The Interior and Exterior Rotary Construction Laser Level is accurate to 1/4 inches at 100 feet. It is constructed to withstand rugged jobsite conditions with a durable rotary cage that helps protect the head if dropped. An innovative configuration of multiple thin struts maintains the unit's strength while eliminating blind spots. The laser level for picture hanging is self-leveling in horizontal mode, and in vertical mode, arrow buttons used for manual leveling are more intuitive than traditional knobs. Sharp and bright, the beam can be seen up to 100 feet indoors, and can be recognized at up to a 1200-foot diameter outdoors with the included detector. The laser also offers a weather-resistant housing for durable and accurate performance. Product uses 9V Lithium Ion batteries and 2 D Batteries for the detector.

name: Laser Level with Tripod, Firecore 360° Self Leveling Cross Line Laser Level with Pluse Mode, Green Lazer Leveler tool for Hanging Pictures Wall Tile Construction, L-Bracket & Carry Pouch Included
short_description: 360 Degree Horizonal Cross-Line: With one ultra-bright 360° horizontal and one 120° vertical green beams provides all-around leveling coverage. 360° horizontal plane and vertical line can be projected separately or together for a variety of applications, gives you maximum green laser brightness up to 82 ft. with high accuracy for ease of measuring

Self-Leveling, Manual & Pulse Mode: When you unlock the pendulum, the laser level will automatically level within ±4° (otherwise the laser will keep flashing); Long press the “Manual” button for 3 seconds, the laser line will be locked in position for use at any angle; To switch to Receiver(Pulse) mode, just single press the "Manual" buttom, then it goes to the receiver mode

Bonus Laser Level Tripod: The laser tripod can expand to 39.5 inches helps you adjust the position of the laser for maximum accuracy. It closed height of 17 inches, ease of storage; Combined with a standard 1/4" quick release plate, you can install and remove the laser level in seconds; NOTE: You need to push quick release plate knob hard before rotating and fixing it to the laser level

Power-Saving Modes: Under the power-saving mode, users can select different green laser line brightness according to different usage environments to work smarter. This self leveling laser level projects green laser beams which is 4 times brighter than standard red beams utilizing the same power source, ideal for installing shelves/door/window, or furniture carpentry, hanging pictures/wallpaper, etc

Magnetic Bracket & Durable Design: The included strong L magnetic bracket allows for attachment to metal surfaces and turn the laser level around at 360°. The laser tool also offers 1/4"-20 mounting threads to suit for standard tripod or laser pole mounts. Besides, equipped with a soft grip, light weight and palm-sized design, easy to carry and IP54 water/dust resistance

name: Professional Pipe Locator Laser Level with Tripod - 100Ft Green Cross Line Self-Leveling Laser for Utility Marking, Plumbing Layout, Picture Hanging & Tile Installation - Includes Battery
short_description: Precision Pipe Location Technology: Features an upgraded green laser chip (2x brighter than red lasers) with 100ft visibility for accurate pipe alignment, utility marking, and plumbing layout. Class II laser (<1mW) ensures safe operation in both indoor and outdoor environments.

Dual-Mode Laser for Plumbing & Construction: Self-leveling mode (±4° range) automatically creates perfect level lines for pipe runs and conduit installation, while manual mode allows angled layouts for sloped plumbing work. Visual out-of-level indicator ensures measurement accuracy.

Job-Site Optimized Visibility: Three adjustable brightness settings adapt to various lighting conditions - ideal for bright construction sites or dim basement plumbing work. Perfect for marking pipe locations through walls or along floors.

Professional-Grade Durability: IP54 water/dust resistant housing withstands tough job site conditions. Compact design easily fits in plumbing toolkits while providing professional-grade performance for utility location tasks.

Complete Pipe Layout System: Includes 360° rotatable tripod (extends to 25.6") with universal 1/4"-20 mounts for stable pipe marking at any height. Compatible with most professional survey tripods for elevated work.
Plumber's Package: Contains 1 laser level, 1 aluminum tripod, 2 AA batteries, and instruction manual. Backed by 1-year warranty with 24/7 support for all your pipe location and construction needs.

name: Johnson Level & Tool 99-027K Self-Leveling Rotary Laser System, 8.75", Red, 1 Kit
short_description: AREA COVERAGE: This Johnson Rotary Laser Tool is perfect for leveling on largescale areas and jobsites. It has a working diameter of 2000’ and is suitable where a rotary with slope is not required.

HIGH QUALITY: The self-level tool features a dustproof and wash down rated housing to offer durability on work sites and in industrial spaces. The robust construction allows easy use for the dustiest outdoor jobs.
EASY TO USE: Equipped with a heavy-duty contractor’s tripod; the rotary aligning level kit allows one-person operation for easy use. It is ideal for grading and leveling any jobsite with convenience.

HIGH ACCURACY: This laser kit for leveling is designed with a powerful class 3A laser beam. With a red laser for increased visibility; a 90-deg. split beam function helps in vertical and horizontal leveling.
PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: This Self-Leveling Rotary Laser Kit is equipped with a detector and 13’ grade rod. It comes in a hard-shell carry case for easy carrying and storage.
Manual leveling in the vertical plane
Visual and audible alarms when beyond leveling range
product_description: The 99-027K is great for large jobsites with its 2000' working diameter. If you're working large jobs and don’t need a rotary with slope, this model is perfect for you. With accuracy of 3" per 100', this rotary is suitable for any layout work you'll encounter. And its IP66 construction makes it suitable for even the dustiest jobsites you'll encounter. It also features a hard-shell contractor's carrying case to hold all system components.

name: Milwaukee M18 Red Exterior Rotary Laser Level Kit w/Receiver, Tripod, & Grade Rod
short_description: Withstands 1.5m Drops – Reinforced Housing, Prevents Beam Interference: Masking Shutters, One-Button Setup, 3/32 In. Accuracy @ 100 ft., 70 Hours of Run-Time. Laser Class 2, Class II, Power output≤3.3mW.
Laser Receiver Reduces Interference - Strobe Light Protection, Laser Receiver Features Easy Read Backlit Display, 2000 Ft. (Diameter) Working Range w/Receiver, 600 RPM
Low/High Bump Sensitivity Modes, IP66 Rated Protection, 5/8-11 in. Threaded insert, ONE-KEY Tracking and Tool Management, Fits All M18 batteries

Includes: (1) 3701-21 M18 Red Exterior Rotary Laser, (1) 48-11-1828 M18 3.0ah XC Battery, (1) 48-59-1812 M18 & M12 Multi Voltage Charger, (1) 3711 Red Exterior Rotary Laser Receiver, (1) 48-35-3700 Rotary Laser Tripod, (1) 48-35-3701 Rotary Laser Grade Rod, (2) AA Batteries, (1) Carrying Case, (1) Red Exterior Rotary Laser Receiver Clamp
Laser Class 2, Class II, Power output≤3.3mW.
product_description: The Milwaukee M18 Red Exterior Rotary Laser Level Kit with Receiver features impact protection and a simplified setup. Designed for harsh jobsite conditions, Milwaukee ensures your laser is protected, withstanding up to a 1.5M drop and a 2M Tripod tip. Getting started with this laser is easy thanks to its simple, 1-button setup. Featuring built-in manual masking shutters, you're now able to block the laser in any desired direction, preventing interference with other lasers on site. The Receiver will detect the laser up to 2000 ft. (Diameter) and has built-in strobe light protection, reducing interference and downtime on the jobsite. The included Rotary Laser Tripod is made with a durable aluminum design that withstands more impacts and tips on the jobsite. The ultimate tool for accurate results for any leveling on any jobsite.

name: AdirPro Universal Rotary Laser Detector (LD-8) - Digital Rotary Laser Receiver with Dual Display and Built-In Bubble Level, Compatible with Most Red Rotary Lasers - Rod Clamp Included
short_description: ✔️ BETTER ACCURACY: AdirPro Rotary Laser Detector boasts a working range of 2,000 feet (Depending on laser). With an accuracy of ±1/16 inches (1 mm) and ±1/8 inches (2.5 mm), it easily directs the user to position the laser higher or lower on a grade rod. This ensures an accurate level reading all the time.

✔️ EASY READING: Our Laser Receiver has a dual-sided crisp clear LCD display. It displays clear and accurate readouts of the elevation, grade sensitivity, and audio and battery status. It also comes with a built-in bubble level for added convenience.

✔️ LONG BATTERY LIFE: Featuring an auto-shutoff feature, this Laser Detector automatically powers off after 10 minutes of inactivity. This lets you extend the device's battery life. A 9V battery will give you approximately 40 working hours of continuous use.

✔️ WIDE COMPATIBILITY: Our Universal Rotary Laser Detector is compatible with most standard Red Rotary Lasers. It works in all lighting conditions, which makes it ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. It comes with a compatible rod mounting bracket with ¼” threading on the nut and screw.

✔️ ROBUST CONSTRUCTION: AdirPro 790-01 LDG-8 Universal Rotary Laser Detector boasts a heavy-duty build and construction with its hard plastic housing and rubber casing. It is IP55 dustproof and water jet resistant – making it ideal for all sites and weather conditions.
